name: .PGP File Extension
summary: Learn about .PGP files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File used by AutoCAD, an engineering design and documentation CAD application; contains external command definitions, which allow users to run custom commands in AutoCAD; can be used for running external programs and Windows commands through the AutoCAD interface; also used for defining aliases, or shortcuts, for commands with verbose syntax.

content: PGP files are stored by default in a file named acad.pgp. They are stored in plain text and contain commands in the following format:
Each command specifies the command alias, an executable to run, process flags, display prompt options, and a return code when the command finishes.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
